arts.ttl: Wolves confirm major decision ahead of Leeds United clash
arts.sum: Leeds United travel to Molineux in a big clash against bottom-half rivals Wolves this weekend, with both managers facing pressure to get results. While we may only be four games into the season, Molineux is playing host to a very early six-pointer in the Premier League. arts.ttl: Wolves issue Jorgen Strand Larsen injury update after training ahead of Leeds United
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira has confirmed that Jorgen Strand Larsen has trained ahead of Wolves’ match against Leeds United. Jorgen Strand Larsen has been out of action since Wolves’ Carabao Cup clash against West Ham, and Vitor Pereira has provided another update on the Norwegian.

arts.ttl: Wolves receive injury boost ahead of Leeds clash
arts.sum: But on the eve of the club's huge match at Molineux against Leeds, head coach Vitor Pereira has now confirmed the Norwegian will be back in action. Larsen has also now agreed a new five year contract, with a year option, in a move that was welcomed by the head coach.

arts.ttl: Wolves, West Ham, Burnley, Leeds, Forest - why Saturday's fixtures really matter
arts.sum: Wolves, West Ham, Burnley, Leeds and Nottingham Forest have all, to varying degrees, made a fairly wretched start to the new Premier League campaign. So, we ask the question, why does this weekend matter so much for each club? Sky Sports' reporters have their say...

arts.ttl: November Premier League fixtures shift for TV coverage, UEFA duties, and midweek drama
arts.sum: Key kick-offs move for Sky and TNT Sports broadcasts, with clubs like Villa, Palace, and Forest rescheduled due to Europa ties. Updated match times keep fans tuned in all month.

arts.ttl: Key player set to make return for Leeds vs Wolves clash – Sources
arts.sum: Daniel Farke will be hoping for a huge response from his Leeds United side after the last time out against Fulham. The Whites lost the game in the dying minutes due to an unfortunate error. arts.ttl: Team News: Wolves vs. Leeds injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest team news for Wolverhampton Wanderers and Leeds United ahead of their Premier League clash on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Wolves looking to prevent lightning striking twice in Leeds Premier League showdown
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers will be bidding to prevent lightning striking twice when they square off against Leeds United in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Paul Merson drops score prediction for Wolves vs Leeds as Vitor Pereira eyes first win
arts.sum: Paul Merson drops score prediction for Wolves vs Leeds On Saturday, it’s Leeds at Molineux for Wolves – and it’s a game both sides will see as an opportunity for three points.

arts.ttl: Leeds United get huge boost – Wilfried Gnonto back in training for Wolves showdown
arts.sum: Leeds United manager Daniel Farke has revealed that Wilfried Gnonto is a major doubt for his side’s trip to Molineux to take on Wolves. However, the winger could just be fit enough to be in the squad on Saturday. The Whites have a few injury concerns ahead of their big game on Saturday.
